entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Saguenay
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
